sentences.en: Does coincidence come under the umbrella of the paranormal?
sentences.cn: 巧合属于超自然现象吗？

sentences.en: Education by itself is no paranormal prophylactic.
sentences.cn: 这是光凭教育无法预防的.
鬼以及其他超自然现象
我调查过将近200个超乎寻常的案件.

sentences.en: It is still paranormal or cannot be explained by since even in this 21 st century now.
sentences.cn: 听说至此21世纪仍然是个用科学常理无法解释到的.

sentences.en: Jack: My brother loves to study paranormal.
sentences.cn: 杰克: 我兄弟喜欢研究有关超自然、超能力的事.

sentences.en: Mysterious Britain - Growing resource highlighting the ghosts, legends, folklore, and paranormal mysteries within the British Isles.
sentences.cn: 神秘英国资源日益突出的鬼, 传说, 民俗和特异功能的奥秘,在英伦三岛.

sentences.en: Mystical Blaze - Dealing with the exploration of paranormal topics, including ghosts, psychics, afterlife, and UFO's.
sentences.cn: 神秘大火打交道探索超自然主题, 包括鬼, 灵异, 来世, 不明飞行物的.

sentences.en: Other occasions requiring temperature controller and safeguarding of paranormal temperature.
sentences.cn: 其它潮湿的温度控制和过温保护的应用场合.

sentences.en: Science may be able to provide some explanations of paranormal phenomena.
sentences.cn: 科学也许能够解释某些超自然现象。

sentences.en: Such experiences are often attributed by those who have them to paranormal forces.
sentences.cn: 有这样体验的人们将此归结为超常能力.

sentences.en: UFO sightings in France areto be revealed - exciting paranormal enthusiasts in the UK.
sentences.cn: 在法国,UFO的目击事件即将被透露 - 这使得联合王国的超常事件狂热者们兴奋.

sentences.en: We have been looking at the shadowy world of the paranormal.
sentences.cn: 我们一直在关注玄奇事物这一神秘世界。

words.tran_cn: 超常的；超过正常范围的

trans.tran_cn: 超出科学可知范围的，不正常的，奇异的
trans.tran_en: paranormal events cannot be explained by science and seem strange and mysterious
